content.question: Which of the following possible actions illustrates a way Congress interacts with the bureaucracy to address the problem shown in the infographic?

choices.label: Congress could raise money through gasoline taxes to address the issues shown in the infographic.
Congress could request that an iron triangle be formed to ensure that all bureaucratic solutions are heard prior to taking action.
Congress could remove the members of the cabinet who work on issues related to transportation.
Congress could have members of the Department of Transportation testify before a committee to discuss the issue and potential solutions.

content.answer: Congress could have members of the Department of Transportation testify before a committee to discuss the issue and potential solutions.
